attributes.action: Stop Foreign aid and give the money to the NHS
attributes.additional_details:
To save the NHS keep it a public service owned by the UK citizens, New hospitals and to have new improved state of the art facilities, to pay all staff very well 
free parking for staff & patients
Free public transport for NHS staff 
To be a world leader for future Generations 
They have proved there worth in time of crisis !
attributes.background: Stop giving away British money to countries that dont need it in foreign aid and give it to the NHS instead .

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304418

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
